Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Third Guru Guru Amar Das Ji. The Third Guru, Guru Amar Das Ji, was the noursiher-upholder of truth, emperor of regions and expansive ocean of bestowals and largess. The strong and powerful angel of death was subservient to him, and the chief of gods of maintaining the accounts of each and every person was under his supervision. The glow of the garb of the flame of truth, and the blossoming of the closed buds is their joy and happiness. The first letter of his holy name, 'Alif', bestows elation and serenity to every strayed person. The first letter of his holy name, 'Alif', bestows elation and serenity to every strayed person. The sacred 'Meem", blesses the ear of every grieved and afflicted person with the savor of poetry. The fortunate 'Ray' of his name is the glory and grace of his divine face and the well-intentioned 'Daal' is the support of every helpless. The second 'Alif' of his name provides protection and refuge to every sinner and the last 'Seen' is the image of the Almighty Waaheguru.
